author: philip
msg: Use the pool cleanup handler to ensure the temporary file is removed
child cleanup handler to remove the plain cleanup handler in a child
(close_file): Don't remove plain cleanup handler. Don't explicitly
delete file as the cleanup handler will do it. Handle errors so that if
diff_cmd and svn_io_remove_file both fail the diff_cmd error is

author: brane
msg: (This is deliberate -- I didn't want to try 'svn mv' on an 'svn mv'd file.)

author: brane
msg: (tests_libsvn_subr_target): Renamed project file and made .dsp path lowercase.

author: sussman
msg: Okay, I'm adding this new mini-feature since I heard no objections.
Feel free to change it however you want.  I'll definitely be using it.
Show last_changed_rev and last_author in status: 'svn st -V' now shows
more information than 'svn st -v'.  -V is now an "extra verbose"
(By the way, unless you've done a fresh checkout of M8, you won't have
this information in your working copy.)

author: cmpilato

(svn_client_commit_info_t): New structure for commit info returned
committed_author, and committed_date, added commit_info parameters.
docstrings.  ** No literary edits made here **
commit_info parameters.  Allocate and populate commit_info if the
committed_date, added commit_info parameters.  Allocate and populate
